item.description: 18 sponsorships have signed up with us this week and we have 982 spots open for January.  Clint Guy and Julio Sanabia invite you to our next Coffee Jazz Mixer & view our fun and easy plan to make money. Yes. Please RSVP & join us this Monday Evening or other nights throughout Metro Boston from 7pm to 9pm. Please check with us for dates and locatioins. We are looking forward to meeting you. Cheers, Clint and Julio say follow us to success.
item.how_to_find_us: See Clint, Julio, Jenn, Maria, Kessandra, Orlando, Jose, and many more members of our team.
item.name: YES. See our fun and easy plan to make money with Coffee.
